name: Simple Shift (Ludum Dare 35)
description:
Controls:
Arrow keys to move around the grid.

W or S to stretch horizontally

A or D to stretch vertically

This game was made in participation of the 35th Ludum Dare. My computer crashed and I had to start over more than 30 hours into the event. So the game was actually made in <12 hours. This is my first submission to Ludum Dare, as well as Newgrounds.
